T02D2750:131b-0: @131b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs phyag stong pa byang chub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2750:131b-1: khyod ni stong pa nyid rang bzhin //
T02D2750:131b-2: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad pa'o //
T02D2750:131b-3: gang zhig dang po'i gzhu ltar dri med mngon pa
T02D2750:131b-4: gsal ba'i sku gzugs mchog / ston ka'i zla ltar
T02D2750:131b-5: rab tu dkar zhing phyogs bcur 'od mdzad khyab pa
T02D2750:131b-6: po // phra ba'i aa dkar shin tu mi rtog ye shes ma lus bskyed pa'i gzhi //
T02D2750:132a-1: shes de nyid gzhan min 'chi ba med thob grol byed rgyal //
T02D2750:132a-2: t'a la bdun srid steng gi mkhar //
T02D2750:132a-3: padmo zla rgyas gdan steng na //
T02D2750:132a-4: dpal ldan stong nyid spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2750:132a-5: lus can lus med ston bsgom bya //
T02D2750:132a-7: sku brgyan padmos phyag mtshan pa //
T02D2750:132a-8: zla ba'i zhal mnga' sdig 'joms phyir //
T02D2750:132a-9: brtson pas bzhengs pa'i dbang po'o //
T02D2750:132a-11: snang dang 'dzin pa zhen pa dang //
T02D2750:132a-12: de rgyun yongs su sbyong ba dang //
T02D2750:132a-13: dri gsum sbyong phyir yig 'bru brgyad //
T02D2750:132a-14: aom am hr'i: dhi tam tvam kham h'um /
T02D2750:132a-15: dkar ser dmar ljang sngon po dang //
T02D2750:132a-16: dung mdog mngon par skabs yod dang //
T02D2750:132a-17: sna tshogs kha dog rim bzhin du //
T02D2750:132a-18: phreng ba dri med 'khor lo bsam //
T02D2750:132a-19: bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgyal //
T02D2750:132a-20: gnas nas nges pa'i sbyor ba dang //
T02D2750:132a-21: yang dag rdzogs pa'i rim gyis su //
T02D2750:132a-22: spros bral la ni spros bral gzhag / sor gzhag blta dang rang grol dang //
T02D2750:132a-23: gnyug ma nyid dang 'od gsal dang //
T02D2750:132a-24: lhun gyis grub dang de sbyang ba //
T02D2750:132a-25: yongs su dag pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2750:132a-26: 'di dag bsgom dang bsgom pa yi //
T02D2750:132a-27: lam gzung ba dang skyon bsal dang //
T02D2750:132a-28: de la mthun pa bsgrub rnam gsum //
T02D2750:132a-29: rim pa bzhin du bstan pa yin //
